name: Frozen Cry
description:
A prototype made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

You must gather your party to fight the danger in the north. The amount of people you manage to recruit determines the outcome. 

If this project is developed further, the planned features could include:

  • More characters to recruit
  • More areas to explore
  • Party management
  • Combat system

Made by Kisuarts & Heklalinya

Portraits made with Portrait Workshop

Music by Myuu thedarkpiano

Map made with Wonderdraft
